name: Jamming The Curve: Basic Rules
description:
Hi! My friend and I developed a prototype of a two-level mini-game that should teach people to follow the basic rules of coronavirus prevention.

I did the first level of the game, where the player needs to keep a distance with a partner and a visitor to the store collecting products, and my friend decided to take part and added the game and created second level, where you need to use a mask to protect against the virus.

It's just  a prototype, but we hope you may find it interesting.
